entry.title: SRE Weekly Issue #458

entry.title: Fixing WiFi for iPad Mini 5
entry.summary: TL;DR My iPad Mini 5 wouldn’t connect to access points running WPA2-PSK/WPA3-SAE Mixed Mode so I’ve had to reconfigure them to just WPA2-PSK in order to get connected. Background I mentioned in my Flint 2 review that my motivation for getting a new router was better stability for my iPad and various devices. It’s certainly […]
